name: df-nacs
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3
body: |- wceq(cnacs, cmpt(s0, universe, crab(s1, cfv(cacs, cv(s0)), wral(s2, cv(s1), wrex(s3, cin(cpw(cv(s0)), cfn), wceq(cv(s2), cfv(cfv(cmrc, cv(s1)), cv(s3))))))))
bodyPretty: âŠ¢ NoeACS =(s0 âˆˆ ğ•Œ â†¦ { s1 âˆˆ(ACS ` s0)| âˆ€(s2 âˆˆ s1, âˆƒ(s3 âˆˆ(P(s0)â‹‚ Fin), s2 =((mrCls ` s1)` s3)))})
comment: Define a closure system of _Noetherian type_ (not standard terminology) as an algebraic system where all closed sets are finitely generated. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 4-Apr-2015.)
